product_name: REI Mini Chevron Stripe Crew Socks - Women's
long_description: REI Chevron Stripe Crew Socks offer everyday comfort in a fun, casual style. Merino wool naturally regulates temperature in any climate, wicks moisture and resists odors. Stretch nylon provides durability; Lycra(R) spandex enhances flexibility and improves fit. Flat toe seams prevent chafing. REI Chevron Stripe Crew Socks are machine washable. *Discount will be applied when you check out. Offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: REI Chevron Stripe Crew Socks offer everyday comfort in a fun, casual style.
